sentences.en: a naked light
sentences.cn: 无罩灯

sentences.en: a picture of a naked man
sentences.cn: 裸体男子的照片

sentences.en: All contestants competed stark naked.
sentences.cn: 所有参赛者都一丝不挂地参加比赛。

sentences.en: Her naked body was found wrapped in a sheet in a field.
sentences.cn: 在田里发现了她的尸体，全身赤裸，裹在一条床单里。

sentences.en: Many stars overhead are invisible to the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 天上的许多星星是肉眼看不到的.

sentences.en: stars invisible to the naked eye
sentences.cn: 肉眼看不见的星球

sentences.en: The baby went naked on the beach.
sentences.cn: 这个小宝贝光着身子在沙滩上。

sentences.en: The children ran naked through the yard.
sentences.cn: 孩子们光着身子跑过院子。

sentences.en: The children stripped off their clothes and swam naked in the river.
sentences.cn: 孩子们脱得光溜溜的在河里游泳.

sentences.en: The governor ordered the prisoner to be stripped naked and whipped.
sentences.cn: 监狱长下令将那个犯人剥光衣服进行鞭笞。

sentences.en: The hot paving stones scorched my naked feet.
sentences.cn: 烫人的铺路石灼烤着我的一双赤脚。

sentences.en: The naked bulb was directly over his head.
sentences.cn: 裸露的灯泡正好在他的头顶上方。

sentences.en: The naked hatred in the woman's face shocked me.
sentences.cn: 那位女士一脸毫不掩饰的憎恨让我震惊。

sentences.en: The nest contained eight little mice that were naked and blind.
sentences.cn: 窝里有8只还没长毛、眼睛尚未睁开的小老鼠。

sentences.en: The planet Mars will be visible to the naked eye all week.
sentences.cn: 整周都可以用肉眼观察到火星。

sentences.en: The water was heated by a naked gas flame.
sentences.cn: 水是用燃气明火加热的。

sentences.en: The worms cannot be seen by the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 这些虫子用肉眼看不见。

sentences.en: They found the body lying half naked in the grass.
sentences.cn: 他们发现尸体半裸着躺在草丛中。

sentences.en: They look like stars to the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 肉眼看来，它们像是星星。

sentences.en: They stripped me naked.
sentences.cn: 他们扒了我的衣服使我全身赤裸。

sentences.en: To the east of our school, there's a naked hillside.
sentences.cn: 我们学校东边有片光秃秃的山坡.

trans.tran_cn: 裸体的，裸露的，率直的，赤裸裸的，缺乏保护，不加掩饰的
trans.tran_en: not wearing any clothes or not covered by clothes
